product_name: REI Nesting Tableware Set - Service for 4
long_description: Forget about the days of camping with a single bowl and spoon, the REI Nesting Tableware set makes packing a full set of dishes and utensils easy, perfect for family getaways and group outings. Includes 4 bowls, 4 plates, 4 cups and 4 utensil sets; all pieces nest neatly in the tub to make tranport easy; levers close over utensils for secure storage. Storage tub doubles as a wash basin; use the included drying rack to dry the dishes after washing them. Use the lid as a cutting board when you're preparing dinner around the campsite or picnic table. Cups can be used with hot or cold beverages, ideal for morning coffee followed by lemonade in the afternoon. BPA-free polypropylene is lightweight, durable and easy to clean.
short_description: Forget about the days of camping with a single bowl and spoon, the REI Nesting Tableware set makes packing a full set of dishes and utensils easy, perfect for family getaways and group outings.
